title: Map cross-repository dependencies across all Zendesk org repos
description:
Analyze and document dependencies between Zendesk organization repositories. This includes:
- Import/require statements
- Package dependencies
- Service-to-service calls
- Shared libraries
- API integrations

See ZENDESK_REPOS.md for the complete list of 1000 repositories.
notes:
Updated scope: 10,187 repos (not 1,000).

Progress:
- ✅ COMPLETED: zendesk/zendesk (Classic) analysis
  - Found 118 internal Zendesk gem dependencies
  - Report: ZENDESK_CLASSIC_DEPENDENCIES.md
  - Also documented external dependencies (CDN, npm, services)
  
- ⏳ REMAINING: 10,186 repositories to analyze
  
Estimated time for full analysis:
- Conservative: 16-24 hours with moderate parallelization
- Aggressive: 10-12 hours with high parallelization
  
See ZENDESK_REPOS.md for complete repository list.

title: Map CODEOWNERS across all Zendesk org repos
description:
Document code ownership across Zendesk organization repositories. This includes:
- Parse CODEOWNERS files from each repo
- Map teams to repositories
- Identify ownership patterns
- Document coverage gaps
- Create ownership matrix

See ZENDESK_REPOS.md for the complete list of 1000 repositories.
notes:
Updated scope: 10,187 repos (not 1,000).

Status: Not started

This task involves:
1. Fetch CODEOWNERS file from each repo (if exists)
2. Parse ownership patterns (@zendesk/team-name, email addresses, etc.)
3. Build team-to-repo mapping
4. Identify repos without CODEOWNERS
5. Create comprehensive ownership matrix

Estimated time:
- Data collection: 8-12 hours (parallel fetching)
- Analysis & report: 2-4 hours
- Total: 10-16 hours

See ZENDESK_REPOS.md for complete repository list.

title: Review and update README to match actual setup process
description: README instructions don't match actual setup. setup.sh exists but isn't mentioned. Need to update Installation section to lead with automated setup script and fix discrepancies around venv, .mcp.json generation, and directory creation.

title: Fix markdown lint violations in README
description: README has 562 markdown lint violations (MD001, MD022, MD025, MD029, MD031, MD032, MD049). These are mostly pre-existing issues with heading structure, spacing around code blocks/lists, and inconsistent emphasis. Need comprehensive cleanup.
